Literature.Title: The effects of shortening lactoferrin derived peptides against tumour cells, bacteria and normal human cells
Literature.Author: Yang N, Strøm MB, Mekonnen SM, Svendsen JS, Rekdal O

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Murine fibrosarcoma MethA(no activity data),Human mammary carcinoma MT-1(no activity data),Human lung carcinoma A549(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=52µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>105µM)
